BIO

Always above the standard.

Clyde Baron Rapinan is a current Electrical Engineering student at UCSD expected to graduate in June 2022. While Electircal Engineering is a very time-consuming major, Clyde still finds time to expand himself in other fields like AI, Web Development, and Leadership. He never settle for only the standard and always pushes himself past his limits in order to deliver quality results no matter the project.
